mapper.insert: insert into baiban_user_clock_in (clock_id, uid, update_time, longitude, latitude) values (#{clockId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, now(), #{longitude,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{latitude,jdbcType=DECIMAL})
mapper.select: select clock_id, uid, update_time, longitude, latitude from baiban_user_clock_in
